code: import{ISLOGGED}from"../actions/isLoggedAction";var isLoggedReducer=function isLoggedReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ISLOGGED:if(action.payload.length>0)return true;else return false;break;default:return state;}};export default isLoggedReducer;
